sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import s from './ProductsByCategoryCard.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addToCartAcrion } from '../../reducers/cartReducer' export default function ProductsByCategoryCard({ id, image, title, price, discont_price }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const current_price = discont_price === null ? price : {price} const discont = Math.round((price - discont_price) / (price / 100)); return (

${current_price}

{discont_price !== null ? `$${discont_price}` : " "}

{discont_price !== null ? `-${discont}%` : " "}

{title}

dispatch(addToCartAcrion({ id: +id, image, title, price, discont_price }))} >Add to cart
) }
